import Mathlib

open Complex

variable (z : ℂ)

theorem exp_conj : exp (conj z) = conj (exp z) := by sorry

theorem sin_conj : sin (conj z) = conj (sin z) := by sorry

theorem cos_conj : cos (conj z) = conj (cos z) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem exp_star (z : ℂ) : exp (star z) = star (exp z) := by sorry

theorem sin_star (z : ℂ) : sin (star z) = star (sin z) := by sorry

theorem cos_star (z : ℂ) : cos (star z) = star (cos z) := by sorry
